definition: A term commonly used to refer to the evening of the sixth day of the week, typically associated with relaxation, leisure activities, and social gatherings.

examples.german: Ich gehe am Samstagabend ins Kino.
examples.english: I am going to the cinema on Saturday evening.

examples.german: Wir treffen uns jeden Samstagabend zum Essen.
examples.english: We meet every Saturday evening for dinner.

examples.german: Am Samstagabend gibt es eine Party im Club.
examples.english: There is a party at the club on Saturday evening.

examples.german: Samstagabend ist meine Lieblingszeit der Woche.
examples.english: Saturday evening is my favorite time of the week.

examples.german: Ich verbringe den Samstagabend gerne zu Hause.
examples.english: I like to spend Saturday evening at home.
